content: A customer solution to the customer pain points of "Cost" and "Lack of Cultural Authenticity" could involve offering a diverse range of inclusively priced sustainable fashion products that accurately reflect a range of cultural heritages. To achieve this, the company could focus on partnerships with female-owned production facilities, global artisans and sources of high-quality, sustainable materials. The company could offer products at different price points, ensuring that all customers have access to sustainable fashion products that accurately reflect their cultural heritage. Additionally, the company could prioritize cultural sensitivity in the design and production of its products and provide resources for customers to learn more about the cultural significance of the motifs and symbols used in its designs.
